properties.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 6 at 3:24AM AKST until February 7 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. The cold wind chills will
cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
Expect wind chills as cold as 55 below zero.

* WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast.

* WHEN...Now to 6 AM Friday.
properties.instruction:
A Wind Chill Advisory means that cold air and sustained wind
speeds of 15 mph or more will create low wind chills. Frost bite
and hypothermia can occur if precautions are not taken.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED
